name: The Perfect General Scenario Disk: World War II Battle Set
description:
The first scenario disk for The Perfect General adds the following historical battles from World War II to the game:
  • 1944 - Pegasus Bridge
  • 1943 - Sicily
  • 1942 - Guadalcanal
  • 1943 - Kasserine Pass
  • 1943 - Gafsa
  • 1944 - Anzio
  • 1944 - Utah Beach
  • 1944 - Omaha Beach
  • 1945 - Okinawa
  • 1944 - Saipan
  • 1942 - Gazala-Bir Hacheim
  • 1945 - Iwo Jima
  • 1944 - Arnhem
  • 1941 - Oahu
  • 1942 - Kharkov
This scenario disk requires that The Perfect General be installed in your system.
